channel.title: Edmundo Santos
channel.description: The daily, weekly, and monthly musings of Edmundo Santos.

item.title: The Scariest Moment
item.description: “The scariest moment is always just before you start. After that, things can only get better.” On each and every one of the blogs that I’d…
item.content:encoded:
“The scariest moment is always just before you start. After that, things can only get better.”

— Stephen King

On each and every one of the blogs that I’d started in the past, I posted this quote. Why this quote, Galadriel? Perhaps it is because I am afraid, and it gives me courage.
